results.name: a(1)=1, a(2)=2; thereafter a(n) = sum of digits of (a(1)+a(2)+a(3)+...+a(n-1)).
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[2] = 2; a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[ Total@ IntegerDigits@ a@ i, {i, n - 1}]; Array[ Total@ IntegerDigits@ a@# &, 78] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 27 2014 *)
program: f x = y : f (x + y) where y = a007953 x
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 21 2003
